title: Frequently {{gradient:Asked Questions}}
subtitle: Find clear answers about our services, process, and technology stack.

faqs.question: How long does it take to develop a web application?
faqs.answer: It depends on the scope. A basic app can take 2–5 weeks, while more complex platforms may require 1–3 months. In our initial consultation, we'll provide a clear timeline tailored to your project.

faqs.question: Do you develop both iOS and Android mobile apps?
faqs.answer: Yes, we develop solutions using React Native. We'll recommend the best approach based on your target audience, budget, and timeline.

faqs.question: What's included in your API development service?
faqs.answer: Our API development includes RESTful and GraphQL APIs, database design, authentication systems, documentation, testing, and deployment. We ensure your APIs are secure, scalable, and well-documented for easy integration.

faqs.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
faqs.answer: Yes. We offer support and maintenance plans that include bug fixes, security updates, performance improvements, and feature enhancements for all our services including web apps, mobile apps, and APIs.

faqs.question: What types of 3D modeling and visualization do you offer?
faqs.answer: We create product visualizations, architectural renders, interactive 3D web experiences, animations, and AR/VR content. Our 3D services range from photorealistic renders to real-time web-based 3D applications using WebGL and Three.js.

faqs.question: What technologies do you use for development?
faqs.answer: We work with modern technologies like React, Node.js, TypeScript, Python, Swift, Kotlin, Blender, and various cloud services. Our stack is selected based on your specific needs for speed, security, and scalability.

faqs.question: Can you help migrate an existing application?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in migrating legacy systems to modern platforms, including web apps, mobile apps, and APIs. Our phased approach ensures a smooth transition with minimal disruption to your business operations.

faqs.question: How much does a mobile app cost to develop?
faqs.answer: Mobile app costs vary based on complexity, features, and platforms. We provide detailed estimates after understanding your requirements.

faqs.question: Do you handle app store submissions?
faqs.answer: Yes, we manage the complete app store submission process for both iOS App Store and Google Play Store, including optimization for better discoverability, compliance with guidelines, and ongoing app store management.

faqs.question: What's the difference between native and cross-platform mobile development?
faqs.answer: Native apps are built specifically for iOS or Android, offering the best performance and platform-specific features. Cross-platform apps use frameworks like React Native or Flutter to deploy on both platforms with shared code, reducing development time and cost.

faqs.question: Can you create interactive 3D experiences for websites?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in web-based 3D experiences using WebGL and Three.js. These can include product configurators, virtual tours, interactive models, and immersive visualizations that run smoothly across all modern browsers.

faqs.question: How do you handle changes or new requirements during development?
faqs.answer: We follow an agile methodology, which allows us to adapt quickly. When changes arise, we assess their impact and work with you to reprioritize and adjust the scope, timeline, and budget if needed.

faqs.question: Do you offer code maintenance for applications built by other teams?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide code maintenance and support for applications regardless of who built them. Our services include bug fixes, security updates, performance optimization, feature additions, and technology upgrades.

faqs.question: What makes your development approach different?
faqs.answer: We go beyond code—we partner with you to understand your business goals and user needs. Our approach combines technical expertise with strategic insight, transparent communication, and quality-first execution across all our services.
